author: Epic Games
description:
Return to the world of ancient Indian mythology and save the universe...or destroy it!

Clash with gods, asuras, and mystical forces in a new third-person action-adventure. Wishlist Raji: Kaliyuga now! https://epic.gm/raji-kalyuga
title: Raji: Kaliyuga | Official Reveal Trailer

author: Epic Games
description:
Experience the latest gameplay reveal for Tides of Annihilation, a single-player Arthurian knight fantasy action-adventure.  This new trailer takes the journey from London to the Otherworld, the realm of Avalon, where Gwendolyn joins forces with her former rival Lamorak to face a powerful foe within the mirrored domain, Tyronoe - one of the eight sisters of Morgan le Fay.  All footage was captured in-game on PC.  

Developed by Eclipse Glow Games and inspired by Arthurian legends, Tides of Annihilation will launch on the Epic Games Store. Wishlist now! https://epic.gm/toa
title: Tides of Annihilation | "Break the Mirror" Gameplay Reveal Trailer

author: Epic Games
description:
It's a Mercenary Day miracle! 

We’re making the first Bounty Pack for Borderlands 4 free for all players via today’s patch! Once you've updated, find and interact with the gift-wrapped present (marked on your map as a new mission) in any major hub, which will initiate the mission to assist Rush. 

And we’re just getting started: 🎁We're adding a fifth Bounty Pack in 2026 for all owners of the Deluxe Edition, the Super Deluxe Edition, and the Bounty Pack Bundle 🎁A new takedown is in development to expand our endgame content, set to release later next year as a free update for all players 🎁The first Invincible Boss, Bloomreaper, arrives this December, along with UVHM level 6. 

Check out our article for more details: https://borderlands.2k.com/borderlands-4/news/bounty-pack-1-free/    

Buy Borderlands 4: https://epic.gm/borderlands-4
title: Borderlands 4 - Bounty Pack 1: How Rush Saved Mercenary Day - Official Launch Trailer

author: Epic Games
description: Power. Money. No mercy. Anaconda Corp invests in the SCREAMER Tournament. Their opponents? The cost of doing business. Wishlist Now on Epic Games Store: https://epic.gm/screamer
title: SCREAMER | Team Reveal: Anaconda Corp

author: Epic Games
description:
Prologue: Go Wayback! from PLAYERUNKNOWN Productions is now available in Early Access for Epic Games Store! https://epic.gm/go-wayback

Survive the wilderness across a new world every time you play. Early Access brings several new features at launch: 

Game Modes: Chart your path to the Weather Tower in Go Wayback!, survive for as long as possible. 

Objective: Survive, or take it easy in Free Roam mode where only fall damage can kill you. 

Custom Game Settings: further customize your run by tweaking the weather, time of day, survival challenge levels, number of items, and more! 

Map Editor: Draw your own maps, or import designs from images to turn into playable worlds.

The studio is working on deeper gameplay, richer worlds, and more ways to customize your run throughout Early Access.
title: Prologue: Go Wayback! | Early Access Launch Trailer
